description:
Ouran High School is a school for the extremely wealthy or talented. http://anidb.net/ch713 [Haruhi] just happens to be more talented than wealthy. Since she had a hair mishap the week before school started and could not afford the school uniform, she was mistaken for a boy.
Wandering into the Third Music Room looking for a quiet place to study, she encounters the school`s Host Club — a group of attractive young men who give their time and affections to females, for a fee. After she breaks an ¥8,000,000 vase belonging to the host club, the leader demands that she work off the money by becoming a host. And when they find out Haruhi is not actually a boy, humour ensues.

REGULAR.description:
After Haruhi literally stumbles in on the Ouran Host Club and breaks an expensive vase, she discovers there’s only one way she’ll ever be able to pay for the damage - working as a Host!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A partir d`aujourd`hui, tu es un hôte !
Kyou kara Kimi wa Host Da
Starting Today, You Are a Host!
Von heute an bist du ein Host
ตั้งแต่วันนี้ไป นายจงเป็นโฮสต์ซะ
今日から君はホストだ

REGULAR.description:
Haruhi’s fickle client seems to have a new favorite Host every week. With a formal party right around the corner, Tamaki masterminds a scheme to help her settle down with the right guy once and for all.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Job of a High School Host!
งานของโฮสต์คลับ ม.ปลาย
高校生ホストのお仕事

REGULAR.description:
With Ouran Academy’s physical exam threatening to expose Haruhi’s secret, Tamaki is forced to utilize some diversionary tactics.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ะวังการตรวจร่างกายเอาไว้ให้ดี

REGULAR.description:
Renge, an intense young woman obsessed with dating sims, declares herself the Host Club’s new manager! Her first order of business: give each of the Hosts a “dark side.”
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การจู่โจมของผู้จัดการหญิง
女子マネージャー襲来

REGULAR.description:
When Haruhi divulges the secret of how she can tell Hikaru from Kaoru, their sibling rivalry quickly spirals out of control.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: คู่แฝดบาดหมาง

REGULAR.description:
Tamaki takes an elementary school student as his apprentice, but the kid’s brutal honesty has everyone’s heads spinning!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Der Grundschüler Host ist ein Frechdachs
The Grade School Host Is the Naughty Type!
โฮสต์จอมซนวัยกระเตาะ
小学生ホストはやんちゃ系

REGULAR.description:
With Honey missing, the Hosts’ vacation turns into a search and rescue mission! But between alligator attacks and the onslaught of a private police force, who will save the rescuers?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: จังเกิ้ลพูล SOS

REGULAR.description:
While at the beach, the twins make a game of finding ways to scare Haruhi! From haunted caves to beachside bullies, the newest member of the Host Club proves as fearless as they come.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Le soleil, la mer et les hôtes
Sonne und Meer und Hosting Club
Taiyou to Umi to Host Bu
The Sun, the Sea, and the Host Club!
อาทิตย์ ทะเล และเหล่าโฮสต์

REGULAR.description:
The Zuka Club drops in to check out the notorious Hosts - and they aren’t impressed. In fact, they have every intention of stealing Haruhi away from the boys.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Challenge from Lobelia Girls` Academy!
การท้าทายจากโรงเรียนสตรีโลเบเลีย
ロベリア女学院の挑戦

REGULAR.description:
Tamaki and the boys investigate Haruhi’s “aggregate commoner dwelling.” Though the apartment’s a tight fit, there’s more than enough room for the special kind of trouble that follows the Hosts around!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Day in the Life of the Fujioka Family!
หนึ่งวันของบ้านฟูจิโอกะ

REGULAR.description:
Nekozawa is famously sensitive to light and his baby sister is terrified of the dark. To bring them together, Renge sets out to reinvent gloomy Nekozawa into a dreamy prince!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Mon grand frère est un prince
คุณพี่คือเจ้าชาย

REGULAR.description:
Mori makes Honey go sugar-free after the cutie gets a cavity, and it doesn’t take long for the littlest Host to turn against his friend!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Les trois jours amers de Hani
สามวันห้ามหวานของรุ่นพี่ฮันนี่
ハニー先輩の甘くない三日間

REGULAR.description:
Haruhi finds herself wandering a weird version of Ouran Academy that can only be described as a Wonderland! Appropriately, Tamaki plays the part of the Mad Hatter.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ฮารุฮิท่องแดนมหัศจรรย

REGULAR.description:
The Newspaper Club wants to run a story on the Hosts in order to boost readership. Unfortunately, the editor’s grudge against Tamaki could cause the guys to end up with some paper cuts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`interview du célèbre club des hôtes
Uwasa no Host Bu o Shuzai Seyo
ตามล่าหาข่าวเหล่าโฮสต์คลับ
噂のホスト部を取材せよ

REGULAR.description:
The boys pay a visit to the bed and breakfast where Haruhi works part-time. But with just one room available, only the Host who can charm Haruhi’s boss the most will win a good night’s sleep!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ศึกแข่งสร้างความสดใสที่คารุอิซาว่า
軽井沢さわやかバトル

REGULAR.description:
To teach his twin a lesson about relationships, Kaoru sends Hikaru and Haruhi on a little date. Hopefully, Hikaru can finally show everyone he’s capable of being thoughtful of others!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Haruhi to Hikaru no Hatsu Date Daisakusen
Haruhi und Hikaru - der große Plan fürs erste Date
Operation Haruhi and Hikaru`s First Date!
แผนเดทแรกของฮารุฮิกับฮิคารุ
ハルヒと光の初デート大作戦

REGULAR.description:
Kyoya finds himself spending a day at a department store with Haruhi. He’s in a bad mood and completely out of his element, offering Haruhi a rare glimpse behind his polished demeanor.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: วันหยุดที่ไม่เต็มใจของเคียวยะ

REGULAR.description:
The cutest little Host is a lethal fighting machine! Well, he used to be. Honey’s decision to abandon martial arts and pursue a life of luxury has his intense younger brother seething with rage!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: La déclaration de guerre de Chika
การประกาศโค่นฮันนี่ของจิกะคุง
チカ君のハニー打倒宣言

REGULAR.description:
The Hosts take action to rescue Haruhi after Benio manipulates her into taking the lead role in Lobelia’s extravagant musical production.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: การโต้กลับของโรงเรียนสตรีโลเบเลีย
ロベリア女学院の逆襲

REGULAR.description:
When Tamaki asked Hikaru and Kaoru to be inaugural members of the Host Club, they showed him just how difficult they could be.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Die Tür, die die Zwillinge aufstießen
La porte ouverte par les jumeaux
ประตูที่คู่แฝดเปิด

REGULAR.description:
Haruhi’s classmates hold a Halloween competition to find out who can be the most horrifying! Terror waits around every corner, but the fear in Kaoru’s heart has nothing to do with ghosts or ghouls.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Bis es wieder zu einem Kürbis wird
Itsuka Kabocha ni Naru Hi made
Jusqu`à ce qu`il devienne une citrouille
Until the Day It Becomes a Pumpkin!
จนกว่าจะถึงวันที่กลายเป็นฟักทอง
いつかカボチャになる日まで

REGULAR.description:
Bad boy Kasanoda’s hoping Mori can help him make some friends. After some time with the Hosts, the tough guy starts looking at things differently - and he’s looking at Haruhi in a whole new way, too!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ขอสมัครเป็นลูกศิษย์รุ่นพี่โมริ
モリ先輩に弟子入り志願

REGULAR.description:
Now that Kasanoda’s hooked on Haruhi, his constant presence in the music room is stirring some troubling emotions in the hearts of a few Hosts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: ความห่อเหี่ยวโดยไม่รู้ตัวของทามากิ

REGULAR.description:
Tamaki and Kyoya have built a solid - if unlikely - friendship by utilizing each other’s strengths, but there was a time when the two boys were more likely to strangle each other than team up to rule the school.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: แล้วเคียวยะก็ได้พบ
そして鏡夜は出会った

REGULAR.description:
Tamaki’s family brings a guest - Éclair - to the school festival, and she’s got designs on the King. Haruhi might be a tad jealous, but it’s Tamaki’s inner turmoil that presents the biggest threat to her happiness.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: L`annonce de la dissolution du club
ประกาศยุบชมรมโฮสต์

REGULAR.description:
The only way to save the Host Club is to keep Tamaki from returning to France with Éclair! With the hopes of her dearest friends hanging in the balance, Haruhi makes her move!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: นี่คืองานโอรังของพวกเรา
これが俺たちの桜蘭祭

titles.title: Host Club - Le lycée de la séduction
ชมรมรัก คลับมหาสนุก
桜蘭高校ホスト部[クラブ]
